## Note

- GES: GWAS eQTL sQTL
- GE: GWAS eQTL
- GS: GWAS sQTL

Coloc loci selected with PIP > 0.75

GWAS hit loci are constructed with 1MB window centering on the lead SNP (< 1e-5)
